**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 175 2.0 **Archetype** [Gladiator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=61) **Prerequisites** [Play to the Crowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=1978) --- When you successfully [Play to the Crowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=1978), add the following to the list of benefits you can choose from:
  • Choose a creature within 30 feet that can see you to become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19). This effect has the [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) traits.
